namespaces.namespace: The namespace that contains the base classes and common classes used by the Address Service and the Tax Service.
The namespace with all the necessary classes for interacting with the Address Validation functionality of the service. The AddressSvc class is the starting point when using this namespace.

The namespace with all the necessary classes for interacting with the Tax Calculation functionality of the service, including getting taxes for a document, posting and committing the document, canceling a document, searching the tax history, and retrieving reconciliation information. The TaxSvc class is the starting point when using this namespace.
The namespace with all the necessary classes for interacting with the AvaCert functionality of the service. The AvaCert2Svc class is the starting point when using this namespace.
